title: How to Bug Through the Wall in Sharktale in Sudden Attack FPS

steps.headline: Go to the Red Team's left (if looking at the blue teams spawn) wall with the little corner that has the little pile of snow.
Stand on the snow and start slashing (left clicking) the wall.
Make sure that to slash the corner (the one the snow is touching) to just until the "hill" or the downfall of the snow.
Keep slashing and you will slowly go through the wall.
Continue to slash until you can see the other door in the room players spawn in.
steps.description: Shoot any other players that may be there.

steps.headline: Ask a teammate to site on the snow in the corner in order for you to go on the cliff.
Slowly tap the forward key while slashing.You'll go further than before and be able to move around the spot freely.
steps.description: Once you are free, you're on the other side of the wall.

steps.headline: Look at the bottom of the wall.
Run off the edge heading towards the ground.
steps.description: Then you will go underwater. Once you are in the water, you'll be able to see the other players but they won't be able to see you.

steps.headline: Go the the Blue Team's spawn and explore a little.
steps.description: Don't go too deep down the water or the spawn arena, or you WILL fall and die.

steps.headline: Take out your pistol and start shooting everyone in the head.
Run away, take out your main gun, and shoot everyone in the head.

text: Get your normal knife out.  Go to the Red Team's left (if looking at the blue teams spawn) wall with the little corner that has the little pile of snow.  Stand on the snow and start slashing (left clicking) the wall.  Make sure that to slash the corner (the one the snow is touching) to just until the "hill" or the downfall of the snow.  Keep slashing and you will slowly go through the wall.  Continue to slash until you can see the other door in the room players spawn in. Shoot any other players that may be there. Ask a teammate to site on the snow in the corner in order for you to go on the cliff.  Slowly tap the forward key while slashing.You'll go further than before and be able to move around the spot freely. Once you are free, you're on the other side of the wall. Look at the bottom of the wall.  Run off the edge heading towards the ground. Then you will go underwater. Once you are in the water, you'll be able to see the other players but they won't be able to see you. Go the the Blue Team's spawn and explore a little. Don't go too deep down the water or the spawn arena, or you WILL fall and die. Take out your pistol and start shooting everyone in the head.  Run away, take out your main gun, and shoot everyone in the head.
